controllers

Class CreateAppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.CreateAppointmentController

  • @PUBLICAPI
public class CreateAppointmentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Use to create appointments for patients who have just walked into the hospital.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateAppointmentController

        @PUBLICAPI
public CreateAppointmentController(LoginController loginController)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        loginController - The login controller of the user that wants to create an appointment for a patient.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidLoginControllerException - If the given login controller is not one from a nurse or is invalid in any other way.
        exceptions.InvalidHospitalException
        See Also:
        HospitalController, NeedsLoginController

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleNewAppointment

        @PUBLICAPI
public scheduler.HospitalDate scheduleNewAppointment(DoctorIN doctor,
                                                      PatientFileIN patient)
        Allows you to schedule a new appointment for the given patient and the given doctor.
        Returns:
        The date on which the appointment has been scheduled.
        Throws:
        exceptions.CanNeverBeScheduledException - If there are not enough doctors present in the hospital to fulfill the scheduling request.

      • getAllDoctors

        @PUBLICAPI
public java.util.Collection<DoctorIN> getAllDoctors()
        Returns:
        A collection of all doctors working in this hospital.

      • getAllPatientFiles

        @PUBLICAPI
public java.util.Collection<PatientFileIN> getAllPatientFiles()
        Returns:
        A collection of all patient files that are stored in this hospital.
